redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: We all knew, and now we know exactly how far Mr [REDACTED] stretched his profound determination to reach a fair peace agreement with the Palestinians, and we know that it was the determination of Mr [REDACTED] and his democratic supporters alone that sabotaged and destroyed this peace process.

Barak dans sa volonté profonde de réaliser un accord de paix juste avec les Palestiniens, et nous savons que seule la volonté de M. Arafat et des démocrates qui l'entourent a saboté et détruit ce processus de paix.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: While the fighting has cooled off, UN Secretary General [REDACTED] Annan this week appealed for an African force of 12 000 troops, up from the 7 500 expected by August and the 2 500 African Union troops who are already in the region.
target_response: Bien que les massacres se soient apaisés, le secrétaire général des Nations unies, Kofi Annan, a lancé un appel cette semaine en faveur de l’envoi d’une force africaine composée de 12 000 hommes, soit plus que les 7 500 attendus pour le mois d’août et les 2 500 hommes de l’Union africaine qui sont déjà dans la région.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: While the fighting has cooled off, UN Secretary General Kofi Annan this week appealed for an African force of 12 000 troops, up from the 7 500 expected by August and the 2 500 African Union troops who are already in the region.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I of course deeply regret Mr [REDACTED]'s refusal of an international inquiry and so I call upon the OSCE to involve the little-known Moscow mechanism last used with Turkmenistan, also an authoritarian regime, to impose an international inquiry and to report with or without Uzbekistan’s consent.
target_response: Je déplore évidemment le refus de M. Karimov de laisser se dérouler une enquête internationale et j’en appelle à l’OSCE pour qu’elle recoure au peu connu «mécanisme de Moscou», utilisé pour la dernière fois vis-à-vis du Turkménistan, un autre régime autoritaire, pour imposer une enquête internationale et pour rédiger un rapport, avec ou sans l’assentiment de l’Ouzbékistan.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I of course deeply regret Mr Karimov’s refusal of an international inquiry and so I call upon the OSCE to involve the little-known Moscow mechanism last used with Turkmenistan, also an authoritarian regime, to impose an international inquiry and to report with or without Uzbekistan’s consent.

user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I expect Ta Mok and his main lieutenants to be tried and sentenced by the establishment of a tribunal whose impartiality is guaranteed by the United Nations.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: Madam President, President Barroso, Mr [REDACTED], this debate on the EU 2020 strategy was rightly preceded by a debate on the crisis in the euro area, and the crucial issue in each debate is how to strengthen European governance.
target_response: Madame la Présidente, Monsieur Barroso, Monsieur López Garrido, ce débat sur la stratégie 2020 de l'UE a été précédé à juste titre d'un débat sur la crise de la zone euro. La question essentielle dans tout débat consiste à savoir comment renforcer la gouvernance européenne.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: Madam President, President Barroso, Mr López Garrido, this debate on the EU 2020 strategy was rightly preceded by a debate on the crisis in the euro area, and the crucial issue in each debate is how to strengthen European governance.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French:       Mr President, the [REDACTED] report relates to a matter of supreme importance, namely the social situation in the European Union.

user_query: Please translate this sentence into French:       Mr President, the Figueiredo report relates to a matter of supreme importance, namely the social situation in the European Union.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: Only yesterday Le Monde revealed [REDACTED]'s conclusions: a litre of agrofuel can contribute up to twice as much to the greenhouse effect as the equivalent amount of fossil fuel.

user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: Only yesterday Le Monde revealed Paul Crutzen's conclusions: a litre of agrofuel can contribute up to twice as much to the greenhouse effect as the equivalent amount of fossil fuel.

Meijer d'avoir concentré son travail sur les réformes réalisées et les objectifs atteints et sur les questions qui exigent encore des efforts supplémentaires.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: At the same time, however, Mr [REDACTED] is warning us that the Commission cannot guarantee us this equivalence.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I want you to take into account the sincere congratulations of our group and I would also like to join in the congratulations for our Commissioner, [REDACTED], for the rigour, efficiency and seriousness she has demonstrated in her work on maritime safety since taking up her position.

user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I would like to remind everyone that Nicholas Stern estimated that 1% of global gross domestic product each year would be needed to protect the climate.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: In particular I would like to thank the members of the European Parliament delegation, led by Mrs [REDACTED], for their invaluable work.
target_response: Je voudrais surtout remercier les membres de la délégation du Parlement européen, menée par Mme Grönfeldt Bergman, pour leur inestimable travail.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: In particular I would like to thank the members of the European Parliament delegation, led by Mrs Grönfeldt Bergman, for their invaluable work.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: Mr [REDACTED]’s warning therefore gives the Community the opportunity to base the common fisheries policy on more accurate, more timely advice, thereby leading to a stronger scientific basis than has thus far been detected.
target_response: L’avertissement de M. Lage offre dès lors à la Communauté la possibilité de définir la politique commune de la pêche sur la base d’avis plus précis et plus opportuns, et d’aboutir ainsi à une assise scientifique plus solide qu’elle n’a pu être observée à ce jour.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: Mr Lage’s warning therefore gives the Community the opportunity to base the common fisheries policy on more accurate, more timely advice, thereby leading to a stronger scientific basis than has thus far been detected.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: It follows that the European Union must offer the Russian people, and President [REDACTED], every assistance in attempting to prevent such far-reaching calamities from happening in future.
target_response: Il s’ensuit que l’Union européenne doit offrir au peuple russe et au président Poutine toute l’aide possible pour tenter d’empêcher que des catastrophes d’une telle ampleur se reproduisent à l’avenir.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: It follows that the European Union must offer the Russian people, and President Putin, every assistance in attempting to prevent such far-reaching calamities from happening in future.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I believe that the report by Mrs [REDACTED] will further encourage the Member States to take action in the field of environmental protection.
target_response: J'estime que le rapport de Mme Ferreira encouragera davantage les États membres à prendre des mesures dans le domaine de la protection de l'environnement.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I believe that the report by Mrs Ferreira will further encourage the Member States to take action in the field of environmental protection.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: Madam President, Commissioner, please excuse the absence of my colleague Mr [REDACTED], who has had to stay in Paris this week because a loved one is very ill.
target_response: Madame la Présidente, Monsieur le Commissaire, veuillez excuser l'absence de mon collègue Alain Lipietz, retenu cette semaine à Paris par l'état de santé préoccupant d'un de ses proches.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: Madam President, Commissioner, please excuse the absence of my colleague Mr Lipietz, who has had to stay in Paris this week because a loved one is very ill.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: There needs to be – and I am calling today for – immediate intervention by the European Union and by you, Commissioner, for the release of the Palestinian parliamentary candidate in Jerusalem, Mrs [REDACTED], who was arrested and is now in jail.
target_response: J’appelle aujourd’hui l’Union européenne et vous-même, Madame la Commissaire, à intervenir immédiatement pour faire libérer la candidate palestinienne aux élections législatives à Jérusalem, Mme Fadwa Khader, qui a été arrêtée et emprisonnée.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: There needs to be – and I am calling today for – immediate intervention by the European Union and by you, Commissioner, for the release of the Palestinian parliamentary candidate in Jerusalem, Mrs Fadwa Khader, who was arrested and is now in jail.
